ComicInfo.Summary: Featuring the ZvC debut of indie star creator Ray Friesen (Pirate Penguin vs. Ninja Chicken) and a new Becky & Bob adventure! Also, a new installment of Rich Koslowski's Death Valley High. Includes the second of the three Z-V-C puzzle variant covers!

ComicInfo.Title: The Big Game! Part 2; Swapsies; Rock 'Til They Drop; Baby Blues
